SCTX:
Begin profaneScript

short doOnce
short enableOnce

if ( GetDisabled == 0 )
	if ( GetJournalIndex TR_ShrineDead < 20 )
		Disable
	endif
else
	if ( GetJournalIndex TR_ShrineDead >= 20 )
		if ( enableOnce == 0 )
			Enable
		endif
	endif
endif


If ( OnDeath == 1 )
	if ( doOnce == 0 )
		if ( GetDeadCount lich_profane_unique >= 5 )
			Journal TR_ShrineDead 50
			Set doOnce to -1 
		endif
	endif
endif

End profaneScript
